title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok after changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. It seems that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations which results in an illegal state when the first operation is set.
SR:
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 
2. In the project properties, change the setting to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
